author: jsign
content:
<@555483069038198827>, I'm soon coming back to the discussion around trying to get some average slot access depth on real blocks execution in mainnet (compared to a ~general view of depths overall, which miss a bit the actual real "usage" distribution of contracts).
After my previous summary of that overall depth, I got hooked into some other implementation related VKTs performance improvements  that are now in review... 
So in the meantime I can jump back on getting some insight about some analysis of depth "on access", which is quite interesting.
I've some plan of using a customized Geth tracer... but I'll be more sure when jumping in in doing it. I'm mentioning it here just to keep you posted that I haven't forgot about that discussion thread, and I might have some news maybe next week, if not the following one.
